Package game.consume

Class ConsumeItem

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.consume.ConsumeItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
EscapeRope, FlaskOfCrimsonTears, GoldenRunes, GoldenSeeds
public abstract class ConsumeItem
extends Item
The ConsumeItem class is an abstract class that represents an item that can be consumed in the game. It extends the Item class. Created by: Loo Li Shen

  • Constructor Details

    • ConsumeItem

      public ConsumeItem​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, boolean portable, int usesLeft)
      Constructs a new ConsumeItem object.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the item
      displayChar - the character to use to represent this item if it is on the ground
      portable - true if and only if the item can be picked up
      usesLeft - the number of uses remaining for the item

  • Method Details
